text: Marco Koskas is a French-Israeli writer. His novel Balace Bounel won the Prix du Premier Roman award for young novelists in 1979. In 2018, his novel Bande de Français, which was self-published on CreateSpace, was nominated for the Prix Renaudot. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:French writers
title: Marco Koskas
